message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $82.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. Would you be willing to go down to $78?
I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise and sell the product to you for $81.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than that. Would you be willing to go down to $77?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $79.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than that. Would you be willing to go down to $76?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $78.
I really like the product, but I'm still a bit higher than that. Would you be willing to go down to $75?
